backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles and daily workout stats with access control and time-based day calculations.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module defining stored actor types and passing state through unchanged.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for recent work.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file mounting the root element and loading the main React entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up routing, theming, React Query, identity provider, and renders the app layout.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication and query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting authenticated users without a profile to enter and save their name.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: App layout with header, navigation tabs, login button, profile setup dialog, and footer.
frontend/src/features/counter/CounterScr: Main pull-up counter UI handling reps, daily goals, authentication state, and local vs backend data sync with dialogs for reset actions.
frontend/src/features/counter/ResetSessi: Confirmation dialog for resetting the current set count to zero.
frontend/src/features/counter/ResetToday: Confirmation dialog for resetting today's total reps to zero.
Empty placeholder file for a rest timer component.
frontend/src/features/counter/useLocalDa: Manages a local daily goal stored in localStorage with automatic day rollover handling.
frontend/src/features/counter/useLocalTo: Tracks today's local reps and sets in localStorage with automatic day rollover and helper functions to add and reset.
frontend/src/features/counter/useWorkout: Empty placeholder file for workout session logic.
frontend/src/features/history/HistoryLis: Empty placeholder file for listing workout history.
frontend/src/features/history/SessionDet: Empty placeholder file for viewing session details.
frontend/src/features/stats/StatsView.ts: Displays stats for today or selected dates, using backend for authenticated users and local data for guests.
frontend/src/features/stats/useUserStats: Empty placeholder file for user stats logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth state, login/logout handling, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profile, daily totals, stats, and goals using the backend actor with authentication checks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and theme variables for light/dark mode, applying global background, text, and border styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/utils/dayStamp.ts: Utilities for converting dates and strings to bigint day stamps and generating today's date/day stamp.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and clearing them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending typography, container queries, colors, radius, animations, and theme tokens.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing scope, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the pullâ€‘up counter app.
